Title: Establishes a cause of action by residents of adult care facilities to petition for appointment of a temporary operator
Summary: Establishes a cause of action by residents of adult facilities to petition for the appointment of a temporary operator of any such facility in violation of the provisions of law, rules and regulations applicable thereto.
LawCode: Amd ยง461-c, Soc Serv L; amd ยง2806-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to granting residents of adult care facilities a cause of action to seek the appointment of temporary operators of such facilities
